name: Wits
description:
The Wits Trait measures the character’s ability to think on her feet and react quickly to a certain situation. It also reflects a character’s general cleverness. Characters with low Wits ratings are thick and mentally lethargic, or maybe gullible and unsophisticated.

By contrast, characters with high Wits Traits almost always have a plan immediately and adapt to their surroundings with striking expedience. Characters with high Wits also manage to keep their cool in stressful situations.

levels.two: You know when to bet or fold in poker.
levels.three: You are seldom surprised or left speechless.
levels.four: You’re one of the people who make others think, 'Ooh, I should have said...' the next day.
levels.five: You think and respond almost more quickly than you can act.
